week.name: Stillness
week.desc: -# For the rare moments when the world finally stops

week.name: Uniqueness
week.desc:
-# Everyone is different
-# Some are more

week.name: Hope
week.desc: -# What die last and burns with mighty flame

week.name: Fallen
week.desc:
-# For those who have lost life
-# So that someone can live

week.name: Daylight
week.desc: -# A reminder that even the longest night ends

week.name: Heroes
week.desc: -# For those who stood when others could not

week.name: Twilight
week.desc: -# For the moments when everything changes quietly

week.name: Silence
week.desc: -# For those who are no longer here with us

week.name: Memory
week.desc: -# For the fragments we keep even when the rest is gone

week.name: Elders
week.desc: -# For those whose wisdom shaped the path ahead

week.name: Echo
week.desc: -# For the things we hear long after they should fade

week.name: Turning Point
week.desc: -# For the choices that rewrite everything

today.week1:
`Monday $$dateformated`

Today starts the **Week Of $$weekname$$**!
In addition today day is **Day of $$dayname**!!
today.week2:
`Tuesday $$dateformated`

Today is second day of the **Week Of $$weekname$$**!
Today is also **Day of $$dayname**!!
today.week3:
`Wednesday $$dateformated`

**Week Of $$weekname$$** continues and **Day of $$dayname** begins today!!
today.week5:
`Friday $$dateformated`

**Week Of $$weekname$$** continues and **Day of $$dayname** begins today!!
The weekend starts today too!! Just hang in there for a few more hours!
today.week6:
`Saturday $$dateformated`

The end of **Week Of $$weekname$$** is approaching...
Today is **Day of $$dayname**
Happy Saturday @everyone!!
today.week7:
`Sunday $$dateformated`

**Week Of $$weekname$$** ends today and **Day of $$dayname** is last day in this week!
